articles.title: Congolese group for study of Juche philosophical idea formed
Kim Yong Nam concludes Vietnam visit
articles.content:
Congolese group for study of Juche philosophical idea formed 
    Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- A Congolese group for the study of the Juche philosophical idea was formed with due ceremony in Brazzaville on July 3.
 Marcel Malaba, professor of history of Marien Ngouabi University of Congo, was elected chairman of the group and its statute was adopted at the ceremony.

articles.title: Chinese residents help builders
KCTU starts solidarity action
articles.content:
Chinese residents help builders 
    Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Chinese residing in Manpho city, Jagang Province, recently gave a sincere helping hand to those engaged in the work to spruce up revolutionary sites and battle sites in order to glorify forever the immortal revolutionary exploits of the three generals of Mt. Paektu.
 They donated necessary equipment, materials, fixtures and furniture to them.    
 They are also helping those working to carry out the Kaechon-lake Thaesong waterway project and spruce up Manpho.
